v-model.description: The value when the radio box is selected

max-width.description: The maximum width of the text position

true-value.description: The selected value is invalid for use in checkbox-group, and must be used together with false-value
true-value.description_zh: 选中值，在 checkbox-group 中使用无效，需同 false-value 一块使用

false-value.description: If the value is not selected, it is invalid to use it in checkbox-group, and it needs to be used together with true-value
false-value.description_zh: 非选中时的值，在 checkbox-group 中使用无效，需同 true-value 一块使用

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the binding value changes, and the parameter is boolean when it is a checkbox group, indicating whether the checkbox is selected
events.description_zh: 绑定值变化时触发，当为复选框组时参数为 boolean，表示该复选框是否选中

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the currently selected state and triggers the change event
methods.description_zh: 切换当前选中状态,同时触发 change 事件
